column4: Description of Business item
column5: Textual description of the business item- Long form description

column4: Apple's line of personal computers.
column5: The Mac segment includes Apple's line of personal computers. It is a revenue item within the Company's consolidated financials and is managed alongside other hardware products.

column4: Apple's tablet product line.
column5: The iPad segment includes Apple's tablet products and related bundled software delivered at the time of sale. It also encompasses product-related bundled services such as iCloud, Siri, and Maps.

column4: Product-related bundled cloud storage service.
column5: iCloud is a product-related bundled service included in the iPad segment, providing cloud storage and synchronization services to users. It is delivered at the time of sale along with the hardware.

column4: Product-related bundled voice assistant service.
column5: Siri is a product-related bundled service included in the iPad segment, offering voice assistant capabilities to users. It is delivered at the time of sale along with the hardware.

column4: Product-related bundled mapping service.
column5: Maps is a product-related bundled service included in the iPad segment, providing mapping and navigation features to users. It is delivered at the time of sale along with the hardware.

column4: Apple's smartphone product line.
column5: The iPhone segment includes Apple's smartphone products, which represent a significant portion of net sales, especially in Greater China. Deferred revenue related to iPhone sales is also disclosed with expected realization timelines.

column4: A cloud service supporting modern business and developers.
column5: Azure is a cloud service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment that supports modern business and developers by providing cloud infrastructure and AI offerings. It is part of the server products and cloud services offered by Microsoft.

column4: A cloud service supporting modern business and developers.
column5: GitHub is a cloud service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment that supports modern business and developers by providing cloud infrastructure and AI offerings. It is part of the server products and cloud services offered by Microsoft.

column4: Cloud services focused on healthcare.
column5: Nuance Healthcare cloud services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment, providing specialized cloud services for the healthcare industry. These services support modern business and developers with cloud infrastructure and AI offerings.

column4: Enterprise and partner services supporting IT professionals.
column5: Enterprise Support Services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment's enterprise and partner services. They focus on enhancing productivity and efficiency for IT professionals and developers through professional services.

column4: A network of enterprise and partner services.
column5: Microsoft Partner Network is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment as part of enterprise and partner services. It supports IT professionals and developers by providing professional services and enhancing productivity and efficiency.

column4: Windows OEM licensing is part of the Windows and Devices products.
column5: Windows OEM licensing is included in the Windows and Devices category within the More Personal Computing segment, focusing on personal technology experiences. It supports consistent user experiences across devices.

column4: Surface devices are included in the Windows and Devices products.
column5: Surface devices are part of the Windows and Devices category in the More Personal Computing segment, contributing to personal technology experiences and consistent user experiences across devices.

column4: Xbox hardware is part of the Gaming products.
column5: Xbox hardware is included in the Gaming category within the More Personal Computing segment, which focuses on expanding gaming ecosystems and delivering consistent user experiences.

column4: Xbox content and subscriptions are part of the Gaming products.
column5: Xbox content and subscriptions are included in the Gaming category, supporting the expansion of gaming ecosystems and providing consistent user experiences across devices.

column4: Xbox cloud gaming is part of the Gaming products.
column5: Xbox cloud gaming is included in the Gaming category within the More Personal Computing segment, enabling cloud-based gaming experiences and ecosystem expansion.

column4: Bing is part of the Search and news advertising products.
column5: Bing is included in the Search and news advertising category within the More Personal Computing segment, providing relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences.

column4: Copilot is part of the Search and news advertising products.
column5: Copilot is included in the Search and news advertising category, contributing to relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences across devices.

column4: Microsoft News is part of the Search and news advertising products.
column5: Microsoft News is included in the Search and news advertising category within the More Personal Computing segment, supporting relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences.

column4: Microsoft Edge is part of the Search and news advertising products.
column5: Microsoft Edge is included in the Search and news advertising category, providing relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences across devices.

column4: A suite of productivity products and cloud services for commercial users.
column5: Microsoft 365 Commercial includes productivity and cloud services designed to enhance business processes and communication across devices and platforms. It is part of the segment's focus on AI-powered business productivity tools.

column4: A suite of productivity products and cloud services for consumer users.
column5: Microsoft 365 Consumer offers productivity and cloud services tailored for individual consumers, enabling communication and information services across devices and platforms.

column4: A professional networking platform with various business solutions.
column5: LinkedIn provides professional networking services along with Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions. It supports intelligent business applications to empower organizations and individuals.

column4: Enterprise resource planning and customer relationship management applications.
column5: Dynamics products and cloud services include Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications that provide intelligent business applications to empower organizations and individuals.

column4: Cloud computing services offered by Google Cloud segment.
column5: The Google Cloud segment provides cloud computing services as part of its infrastructure offerings. These services are a key component of the segment's distinct business focus within Alphabet.

column4: Infrastructure offerings provided by Google Cloud segment.
column5: Google Cloud segment offers infrastructure offerings alongside cloud computing services. These offerings contribute to the segment's growth and distinct business focus within Alphabet.

column3: Google Search and other related services
column4: Consumer-facing search engine and related services.
column5: Google Search and other related services provide users with access to information through a powerful search engine and associated tools. These services form a core part of Google's consumer offerings.

column4: Advertising services across Google's network.
column5: Google Network advertising encompasses ads served across Google's network of partner sites and platforms, enabling advertisers to reach a broad audience beyond Google's own properties.

column4: Subscription services, platforms, and devices offered by Google.
column5: This includes various subscription-based services, platforms, and devices provided by Google, contributing to the consumer and advertiser-facing product portfolio within the Google Services segment.
